tuv.seg: There are important rules that govern the employment of children and young people
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na rialacha a bhaineann le fostaíocht páistí agus daoine óga
Hours of work for young people
The working hours for children and young people are regulated by legislation which sets maximum working hours and rest intervals
Tá na huaireanta oibre do dhaoine óg rialaithe ag reachtaíocht a leagann síos téarma íosaoise maidir le uaireanta uasoibre agus tréimhsí sosa
